kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/api/users/delete-account path_url=/api/users/delete-account headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Authorization': 'Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJjbWxyeGJnZnkwMDAzb2hmenNpeTNiYzhhIiwicm9sZSI6IlBBU1NFTkdFUiIsImlhdCI6MTc3MTQxMjU5NCwiZXhwIjoxNzcxNDE2MTk0fQ.TMyZBBOyPWORmP55w-nUoVWn_6XGO-uqUxjU0sXckmw', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '29'} body=b'{"email": "test555@test.com"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${resp_json} = {'message': 'คำขอการลบบัญชีสำเร็จ', 'detail': 'บัญชีจะถูกลบอย่างถาวรหลังจาก 90 วัน', 'scheduledDate': '2026-05-19T11:03:43.020Z'}
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Delete All Sessions
kw.doc: Removes all the session objects
